title: Merge AVI/MP4/MOV/MPG/WMV into one video
text: Merge AVI/MP4/MOV/MPG/WMV into one video , 30 September 2015 -- AllPepole Video merger is a professional and an easy-to-use application and video joiner tools which allows you to connect or merge multiple video files merged into one, and transform it into the required format at the same time. It can be added, such as AVI, MP4, MOV and more of the same or different format files into a single video. Powerful video merge supports a variety of formats, such as AVI, MP4, MOV, MPG, WMV, ASF, M4V, MKV, DV, common formats such as VOB. Free video joiner also supports batch mode, allows you to save your time. The scheme has a simple, easy to use wizard interface; it can simplify your work. You just add you want to convert video, and then select a format to specify the location of the output file. The plan also contains a lot of default. So, you can set the quality of the output file: MPEG4, Blackberry, Armors, Creative Zen Vision, YouTube, MySpace, DivX and other videos. Biggest characteristic, a super video joiner is its ability to a variety of video formats to join. This means that there is no need to be combined into the same to all video formats. You can merge multiple different video formats. Powerful video encoder and flexible combination, make the software video recruits of leaders. You can join all video clips to create a big video file, and then convert them into your multimedia mobile phone, iPod or DVD player play. Download AllPepole Video Merger at app store:
